name: ALPR
description: This database contains the locations of various fixed automated license plate recognition cameras, specifically in north-east Ohio. This database is far from comprehensive, and is a work in progress.
author: V0LT

entries.name: Falcon
entries.description: A black, solar powered unit placed on a pole on the west side of the road, reading the license plates on the back of vehicles traveling south on County Line Road just after passing Fairmount Road.

entries.name: Falcon
entries.description: A black, solar powered unit placed on a pole on the east side of the road, reading the license plates on the back of vehicles traveling north on County Line Road just after passing Fairmount Road.

entries.name: Falcon
entries.description: A black, solar powered unit placed on a pole on the south side of the road, reading the license plates on the back of vehicles traveling west on Fairmount Boulevard just after passing County Line Road.

entries.name: Falcon
entries.description: A black, solar powered unit placed on a black pole on the side of the road, scanning the license plates on the backs of cars headed south, entering Hunting Valley.

entries.name: Falcon
